name: The Stranger Interactive Film
description:
- You decide the course of story!
- An interactive journey where your actions will change the course of events!
- Relive the classic B-Movie style in a Psychological Thriller key!
- Multiple story endings that will depend on your choices

Make the decisions, the protagonist of the story is you!
Decide whether to go in one direction or another, whether to attack or flee, whether to resort to weapons or not!

The Story:

Your wife died in a boat accident.
After the funeral for months you have been away from everyone and everything.
You have retired to a farm in the middle of nowhere.
But maybe.. you're not alone.

Choices and Explorative Areas:

During the adventure you will have to make many choices that will lead you to death or to different endings of the story.
You can decide calmly or you will have to decide instinctively as some present a countdown.

Not only that, you will find exploration areas where depending on the objects you find you will unlock various paths that otherwise will not be available forwards.

Explore in depth the complex alternatives, you can play the adventure over and over again, for hours of entertainment!
It all depends on you!

The game is located in:
Languages: English
Subtitles: English, Spanish, Italian, German, Chinese (simplified)
